00144 
00145 inline CMatrix3d::CMatrix3d(const CVector3d& axisX,
00146                                                  const CVector3d& axisY,
00147                                                  const CVector3d& axisZ)
00148 {
00149        SetAt(0, 0, axisX[0]);
00150        SetAt(0, 1, axisX[1]);
00151        SetAt(0, 2, axisX[2]);
00152        SetAt(1, 0, axisY[0]);
00153        SetAt(1, 1, axisY[1]);
00154        SetAt(1, 2, axisY[2]);
00155        SetAt(2, 0, axisZ[0]);
00156        SetAt(2, 1, axisZ[1]);
00157        SetAt(2, 2, axisZ[2]);
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00161 inline CMatrix3d::CMatrix3d(double m11, double m12, double m13,
00162                                                  double m21, double m22, double m23,
00163                                                  double m31, double m32, double m33)
00164 {
00165        SetAt(0, 0, m11);
00166        SetAt(0, 1, m12);
00167        SetAt(0, 2, m13);
00168        SetAt(1, 0, m21);
00169        SetAt(1, 1, m22);
00170        SetAt(1, 2, m23);
00171        SetAt(2, 0, m31);
00172        SetAt(2, 1, m32);
00173        SetAt(2, 2, m33);
00174 }

00197 inline CVector3d CMatrix3d::GetAxisX() const
00198 {
00199        return CVector3d(GetAt(0, 0), GetAt(0, 1), GetAt(0, 2));
00200 }
00201 
00202 
00203 inline CVector3d CMatrix3d::GetAxisY() const

00208 inline CVector3d CMatrix3d::GetAxisZ() const

00210        return CVector3d(GetAt(2, 0), GetAt(2, 1), GetAt(2, 2));

00224 inline void CMatrix3d::GetAxesLengths(CVector3d& result) const
00225 {
00226        result.SetX(GetAxisX().GetLength());
00227        result.SetY(GetAxisY().GetLength());
00228        result.SetZ(GetAxisZ().GetLength());
00229 }

00241 
00242 inline CMatrix3d CMatrix3d::GetTransposed() const
00243 {
00244        return CMatrix3d(    GetAt(0, 0), GetAt(0, 1), GetAt(0, 2),
00245                                           GetAt(1, 0), GetAt(1, 1), GetAt(1, 2),
00246                                           GetAt(2, 0), GetAt(2, 1), GetAt(2, 2));
00247 }
00248 
00249 
00250 inline double CMatrix3d::GetDet() const
00251 {
00252        return (GetAt(0, 0) * GetAt(1, 1) * GetAt(2, 2)) + 
00253                      (GetAt(0, 1) * GetAt(1, 2) * GetAt(2, 0)) +
00254                      (GetAt(0, 2) * GetAt(1, 0) * GetAt(2, 1)) -
00255                      (GetAt(0, 0) * GetAt(1, 2) * GetAt(2, 1)) -
00256                      (GetAt(0, 1) * GetAt(1, 0) * GetAt(2, 2)) -
00257                      (GetAt(0, 2) * GetAt(1, 1) * GetAt(2, 0));
00258 }

00280 
00281 inline CMatrix3d CMatrix3d::operator/(double scale) const
00282 {
00283        return CMatrix3d(    GetAt(0, 0) / scale,
00284                                           GetAt(0, 1) / scale,
00285                                           GetAt(0, 2) / scale,
00286                                           GetAt(1, 0) / scale,
00287                                           GetAt(1, 1) / scale,
00288                                           GetAt(1, 2) / scale,
00289                                           GetAt(2, 0) / scale,
00290                                           GetAt(2, 1) / scale,
00291                                           GetAt(2, 2) / scale);
00292 }
